channel.title: Havok Remix
channel.description:
Its nothing special but I would rather take it off my pc.
http://uppit.com/wr40sfw1xg0a/New_Folder_(4)_-_Copy.7z
Easyrsc based, the project was all for fun and learning experiences. The 7th skill is "points". You gain points when you kill somebody and you can use the points to buy items.
I was changing the landscape from the custom landscape to the original rsc landscape with edge cut out. Im not sure If I fixed it or not. In the client there should be the custom landscape and the server should have the landscape I was working on.
